description: This file defines interfaces and implementations for puzzle engines used in a word-guessing game platform, including a protocol for engine evaluation and specific classes for classic word-guessing and anagram puzzles.

classes.name: Engine
classes.description: A protocol defining the interface for puzzle engine implementations with an 'evaluate' method.

classes.name: ClassicEngine
classes.description: A dataclass implementing standard Wordle-like feedback evaluation for word guesses.

classes.name: AnagramEngine
classes.description: A dataclass implementing evaluation for anagram puzzles, checking for permutation correctness.

methods.name: List[LetterFeedback] _compute_letter_feedback(target: str, guess: str)
methods.description: Computes per-letter feedback (correct, present, absent) for a guessed word against a target, following Wordle-like rules.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] evaluate(self, target: str, guess: str)
methods.description: Method in 'ClassicEngine' to evaluate a guess against the target with feedback.

methods.name: evaluate
methods.description: Method in 'AnagramEngine' to evaluate if a guess is a correct permutation of the target.

ctags.name: evaluate
ctags.pattern: /^    def evaluate(self, target: str, guess: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: evaluate
ctags.pattern: /^    def evaluate(self, target: str, guess: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: evaluate
ctags.pattern: /^    def evaluate(self, target: str, guess: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
